description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition 2 (approved plans), condition 5 (internal sound insulation), condition 6 (external sound insulation) of planning permission reference 241842FUL Dated 07/10/2024 'Change of use of the ground floor (Use Class E) into 1 self-contained flat (Use Class C3); conversion of first floor and second floor to two self-contained units; creation of a mansard roof level for habitable use; single storey detached garden outbuilding; single storey rear extension; creation of a balcony to the first floor rear elevation; second floor rear extension including the creation of a balcony'. Variation seeks minor amendments to ground floor front facade, ground floor rear facade minor amendments, rear first floor terrace minor amendment; existing windows to be upgraded
